BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 160259Z JUN BY
   M/V NPS RAMFORM SOVERING TOWING 14 8100 METER LONG
   CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   24-41.52S 041-50.80W, 25-07.10S 042-58.12W,
   24-20.00S 043-10.00W, 24-20.00S 042-30.00W.
   EIGHT MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1184/12.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 160359Z JUN.
